title: My Dad Told Me to Delete His Number
description:
13-year-old Sarah is the daughter of divorced parents and says a recent argument with her dad ended with them not speaking to one another. - Dr. Laura: "Admit to your father how much you regret the way you acted."

Have you ever admitted to being wrong in a fight? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura

Instagram.com/DrLauraProgram
